AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shirasu Azusa
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The ice witch of Trinity's Supplemental Lessons Club.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shimoe Koharu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Koharu is a member of the Supplemental Lessons Club of Trinity Integrated Academy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ajitani Hifumi
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A sensitive girl, Hifumi is a student of Trinity Integrated Academy and a member of the Supplementary Classes Club.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Urawa Hanako
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Trinity's Supplemental Lessons Club's paragon of sensitivity.
